title: Enable dithering in Canvas and remove blocking comment

requirements.summary: Remove blocking comment about dithering from CubeVisualization.tsx
acceptanceCriteria: Lines 323-325 in CubeVisualization.tsx no longer contain the blocking comment about dithering

file_operations.description: Remove the comment on lines 323-325 that mentions 'dithering на уровне материалов — правильно' which is blocking the addition of dithering to the Canvas gl configuration. This comment is preventing the dithering configuration from being applied to the Canvas component.

requirements.summary: Add dithering property to Canvas gl configuration
acceptanceCriteria: The Canvas component's gl prop includes dithering: true
All other existing gl properties (antialias, powerPreference, alpha) are preserved
Dithering is enabled in the 3D rendering context

file_operations.description: Add 'dithering: true' to the gl prop object of the Canvas component (around line 310). Ensure the gl object includes all existing properties (antialias: true, powerPreference: 'high-performance', alpha: false) plus the new dithering: true property. This enables dithering at the WebGL context level for improved color gradation in the 3D scene.
